II fldgi – wêlrK

iïu; jQ mk;a ... ... ... ... —
mk;a flgqïm;a ... ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha oekaùï ... ... ... ... —
Y%S ,xld weme,a Widúfha oekaùï ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha wmrdO kvq ieis ms<sn| ksfõok ... —
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï ... 280
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
279- B 081286 — 353 (2018/06)
D 1 -
   msgqj 
jia;= Nx.;aj kvq ms<sn| oekaùï ... ... ... —

  fuu .eiÜ m;%h www. documents.gov. lk fjí wvúfhka nd.; l< yel' 
i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk oekaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs 
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m<lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd Èkhka iy fõ,djka 
ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lsÍu i|yd oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika 
lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk whg m%udKj;a 
ld,fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu 
i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< 
jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr ^tkï" 2018 cqks ui 22 jeks Èk m< lrk .eiÜ 
m;%fha oekaùï 2018 cqkss ui 08 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr& ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg NdrÈh hq;= h'
    2006 wxl 19 ork bf,lafg%dksl .Kqfokq mk; - 9 jeks j.ka;sh
   zzhï m%ldYkhla" Í;shla" ksfhda.hla" kshuhla" w;=re jHjia:djla" ksfõokhla fyda fjk;a lsisjla .eiÜ m;%fha m< l< hq;= njg 
hï mk;lska fyda kS;s m%{ma;shlska úêúOdk i,iajd we;s wjia:djl" ta Í;sh" ksfhda.h" kshuh" w;=re jHjia:dj" ksfõokh fyda fjk;a foh 
bf,lafg%dksl iajrEmfha jk .eiÜ m;%hl m< lrkq ,enqjfyd;a ta úêúOdkh iïmQ¾K lr we;a;dla fia ie<lsh hq;= h'˜

2018 ckjdß ui 01 jeks Èk"
fld<U 08"
rcfha uqøK fomd¾;fïka;=fõ § h'
ie' hq' -  (i)  noaO ksjdi whs;slï ^úfYaI úêúOdk& mk;a flgqïm; 2018 uehs ui 25 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;s%l iudcjd§ ckrcfha 
.eiÜ m;%fha II jeks fldgfia w;sf¾lhla jYfhka m< lrk ,§' 
 (ii)  fckrd,a Y%Su;a fcdaka fld;,dj, wdrlaIl úYajúoHd,h ^úfYaI úêúOdk& mk;a flgqïm; 2018 uehss ui 25 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld 
m%cd;dka;s%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha II jeks fldgfia w;sf¾lhla jYfhka m<lrk ,§'

ufyaia;%d;a wêlrKh - je,suv
wjqreÿ mylg jvd mer‚ kvq fmd;a úkdY lsÍu
fuu wêlrKfha mjrk ,ÿj ±kg wjika lrk ,o j¾I mylg jvd mer‚ my; i|yka kvq jd¾;d 2018'08'25 jeks Èfkka 
miqj fuu wêlrK N+ñfha§ mq¿iaid úkdY lsÍug iQÞkï lr we;'
   02' fï iïnkaOfhka hï md¾Yjlrefjl=g ;udg wjYH kvqjl iïmQ¾K iy;sl l< msgm;la fyda tys hï 
fldgila fyda ,nd .ekSug wjYH kï tA i|yd b,a¨ïm;%hla 2018'08'25 jeks Èkg fmr fuu wêlrKfha frðiag%d¾jrhd 
fj; bÈßm;a l< hq;=h'

 Èid úksiqre yd ufyaia;%d;a"

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2018'06'01
302  
.Kka fírd jid oeóu ms<sn| oekaùu
iajlSh isú,a wêlrK n,h l%shd;aul lrñka fld<U§ mj;ajkq ,nk niakdysr m<df;a uydêlrKfha § h
fld<U 01" frday,a ú§fha" kdkdhlaldr ì,aäxys" 3 jeks uyf,a" 
wxl 65 ork ia:dkfha ,shdmÈxÑ ld¾hd,h msysá nefrdaia ,xld 
^m%hsfjÜ& ,sñgâ ^PV 93974& iud.u ms<sn| ldrKfha § h'
iy
2007 wxl 07 ork iud.ï mkf;a XII jeks fldgi hgf;a iy th 
m%ldrj wêlrKh úiska .Kka fírd jid oeóu i|yd jQ b,a,Sula

nefrdaia ,xld ^m%hsfjÜ& ,sñgâ"
wxl 65"
3 jk uy,"
kdkdhlaldr ì,aäx"
frday,a ùÈh" fld<U 01'
''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''fm;aiïlre'
fld<U 01" frday,a ù§fha" kdkdhlaldr ì,aäxys" 3 jeks uyf,a" wxl 65 ork ia:dkfha ,shdmÈxÑ ld¾hd,h msysá nefrdaia 
,xld ^m%hsfjÜ& ,sñgâ" (PV 93974) iud.u .Kka fírd jid oeóu i|yd 2018 ud¾;= ui 29 jeks Èk ork fm;aiula isú,a 
wêlrKh n,h l%shd;aul lrñka fld<U § mj;ajkq ,nk niakdysr m<d;ano uydêlrKhg bÈßm;a fldg we;s nj;a" 
tlS fm;aiu ms<sn| úuiSu 2018 cQ,s ui 25 jeks Èkg kshu lr we;s nj;a" tlS fm;aiu iïnkaOj ksfhda.hla lsÍu 
iïnkaOfhka mdlaIslj fyda úreoaOj lreKq oelaùug woyia lrk tu iud.fï ljr fyda Kh ysñfhl=g fyda odhlfhl=g

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2018'06'01
305
 
.eiÜ m;%h m< lsÍu ms<sn|j jeo.;a ksfõokhhs
i;sm;d uqøKh jk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha  .eiÜ m;%h idudkHfhka  isl=rdod Èkj, m<  lrkq ,efí' 
isl=rdod Èkhla rcfha ksjdvq Èkhla jQ  úg tu isl=rdod  Èkg m%:u jev lrk Èkfha .eiÜ m;%h m< lrkq ,efí'  ta wkqj .eiÜ 
m;%fha  m< lsÍu i|yd  ksfõok Ndr.kakd wka;su  Èkh o tu i;sfha we;sjk  ksjdvq Èk .Kk wkqj fjkia  jkq  we;'
ta ta .eiÜ m;%fha m< lsÍu i|yd ±kaùï Ndr .kakd wka;su Èkh iy fõ,djka  my; m< lr we;s Wmf,aLkfha ±lafõ'  
my; i|yka  kshñ;  fõ,djg  miq ,efnk  ish¨u ±kaùï th tjQ wh fj; ;emEf,ka  wdmiq tjkq ,efí'  B<Õ .eiÜ m;%fha  
th m< l< hq;= kï wjYH ixfYdaOkhka lr wdmiq  túh hq;=h' rcfha  uqøKd,h fj; ;eme,a  u.ska tjk ±kaùï  wm%udoj tys 
,eîug iEfyk fõ,djla §  ;eme,a lsÍfuka  jqjukd  .eiÜ m;%hg ±kaùu we;=<;a  fjkjd fuka u th ish¨ fokdf.a u myiqjg 
o fya;= jk nj i<lkak'

fl<ska u f.úh hq;=h'

túh hq;= nj i<lkak'
